attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister:
   Hello.I'm a Chinese student named Shang Yongchao who is very worship you.
I think it's a great honour to write a letter for you.
   Today, as a senior high school student,I believe it's necessary to know what is happening in the world.And I have a lot of question in my mind.So I want you let me know your contact so that I can ask you some questions that I can't gain answer on TV  directly.I guarantee you it will not cost you a long time.
   I look forward to receiving your reply.
   By the way,let's hope that the London Olympic Games will gain a great success!
                        By ShangYongchao

rejection.details:
There are a number of ways to communicate with the Prime Minister. Please see the following: 
http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
http://www.number10.gov.uk/communicate
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
